actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain claims of Bobby R. Prince of Fort Smith, Arkansas, against the United States under the tort claims provisions of title 28, United States Code, shall not be barred in a civil action brought within one year after enactment of this bill.

summary.text: Allows a named individual, notwithstanding certain time limitation provisions, to bring a civil action against the United States for claims arising from the failure of the Veterans Administration to provide timely medical treatment.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain claims of Bobby R. Prince of Fort Smith, Arkansas, against the United States under the tort claims provisions of title 28, United States Code, shall not be barred in a civil action brought within one year after enactment of this bill.
